column1: "Your Tax Documents are Available","Dear customer, Your tax documents for the previous fiscal year are now ready for download from your online account. We have prepared and securely stored your 1099-INT and other relevant tax forms. To access these documents, please log in to your account and navigate to the 'Documents' or 'Tax Center' section. For your security, these documents are not attached to this email. We strongly recommend that you consult with a qualified tax professional to review these documents and to ensure your tax filing is accurate. Our customer service team is also available to assist you with any questions you may have about accessing your account or the documents themselves."
